data.text: @TomKaz I think I was following it a lot more closely in those days. Crazy times!

@jonathanharrier Holy crap! You did a screenshot! Kudos to you. I typically pull data eod or early in the morning, and occasionally I have noticed slight differences. I wish CNN would simply provide historical data. How hard could it be?

@TomKaz 03/12/20 is what I had a screenshot of, but in the morning.  So it could've been higher by the end of the day.  And that wasn't the bottom of course; I was wrong on that. https://t.co/xOJjRmSpxf
@jonathanharrier Rising from <25 is my criteria, but sentiment models alone don't generate good buy/sell signals. Coupled with very short term trend indicators, they are very useful.
@jonathanharrier Do you have a date for 1? I've been recording these daily since 2018, and the lowest scores according to my records is 2, once in 2018 and once in 2020.
